title: Characterizing biomolecular structure features through an innovative elliptical dichroism spectrometry for cancer detection
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Yusuf Asad, Keerthi Priya Jangili, Amara Arshad, Maliha Elma, Komila Rasuleva, Alfred Akinlalu, Tommy Gao, Umamaheswara Rao Tida, Wenjie Xia, Dali Sun
